metadata.title: For Business Travel Agencies

expandedService.title: Expanded Service Offering
expandedService.description: Offer comprehensive meeting and event management services to your clients.

operationalEfficiency.description: Streamline your operations with automated processes and integrated tools.

features.title: Key Features for Business Travel Agencies

whiteLabel.title: White Label Solution
whiteLabel.description: Offer Event Logic as your own branded solution to your clients, with your logo and colors.

clientManagement.title: Client Management
clientManagement.description: Manage all your clients' events in one place, with detailed reporting and analytics.

integratedInvoicing.title: Integrated Invoicing
integratedInvoicing.description: Simplify your billing process with integrated invoicing for all event-related expenses.

cta.title: Ready to digitize your event management process?
